    right="Feat 4"

>
[Hidden Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=6425) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 219 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=267)

**Prerequisites**
[Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6424); Expert in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), Expert in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43), Expert in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44), or Expert in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)

</column>

---

You've learned to hide the magical auras of your gear. During your daily preparations, you carefully tweak any or all of your magic items to appear non-magical. Objects adjusted in this way remain so until your next preparations. A spellcaster using [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1485) or [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1646) must succeed at a Perception check against your [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) DC to see through your obfuscations.
